item.title: Moderna Stock Rallies On Reports Of Company Entering Talks With A Drugmaker For A Potential Deal
item.description: According to a report from Seeking Alpha, citing Stat News, Moderna has held talks with at least one large drugmaker.

item.title: Ray Dalio Recommends All Investors Hold ‘At Least Some’ Gold In Their Portfolios
item.description: Dalio highlighted that gold has preserved its value across thousands of years, while fiat currencies have repeatedly lost purchasing power.

item.title: CPI Aerostructures’ Stock Nearly Doubled Today: What’s The Raytheon Deal About?
item.description: CPI Aerostructures to produce structural wing assemblies for a missile program

item.title: Tesla AI Lead Says Only Elon Musk Blends Mastery In Robotics And AI, Urges Support For His $1 Trillion Pay Package
item.description: In a post on X, Tesla’s AI lead, Ashok Elluswamy, reiterated that Musk is a key driver of Tesla’s AI and autonomy efforts.

item.title: AT&T Sues Advertising Watchdog Over Claims Of Truthful Speech Suppression
item.description: National Advertising Division’s decisions between 2022 and 2025 concluded that several T-Mobile ads were misleading.
